title: Does Billy Joel Give Away Front Row Seats for His Concerts, Rather Than Sell Them?
subtitle: A widely-shared meme reinforces the "Piano Man's" reputation as a down-to-earth superstar with a close affinity for his fans.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Billy Joel does not sell seats for the first few rows of his concerts, preferring instead to distribute them to "real fans" who have bought cheaper tickets.
